listing.listing_description:
Sky Loft is a stunning sub-penthouse apartment in the prestigious Darlinghurst suburb of Sydney. Situated within minutes of some of the city’s finest attractions, the home enjoys panoramic views of the downtown skyline from its wrap-around balcony and luminous interiors. Three lovely bedrooms sleep six, providing ideal accommodations for families or small groups seeking stylish and lofty comfort near the heart of this global capital.

The villa's décor features mid-century modern furnishings with touches of Old World elegance and exquisite wood in the floors, dining tables, and cabinetry. Expansive glass walls join the open-concept living area with the balcony, infusing the home with ample natural light and breezes from the bay. Two sumptuous lounge areas flank the dining table: one with a beautiful crescent banquette (ideal for pre-dinner cocktails), the other with a supple leather sectional and two stylish armchairs. The dining table seats ten beneath a gorgeous chandelier, while the alfresco table on the balcony enjoys privileged views of the horizon. A vintage kitchen is equipped with chef-grade Electrolux appliances and a stunning marble bar.

All three bedrooms open to the balcony, inviting dreamy morning light and nighttime breezes into your private moments. The master suite includes a king bed and an open-concept, ensuite bathroom with shower and soaking tub. The two guest suites both have queen beds, and one enjoys an ensuite bathroom as well.

An elevator delivers you to the ground floor, where the extraordinary city of Sydney unfurls before you. Myriad renowned destinations—including the Australian Museum, the Oxford Art Factory, the Royal Botanic Gardens, and the Sydney Opera House—are within two to five kilometers, while Tamara Beach, Coogee Beach and Bondi Beach are in easy reach. Sydney Airport is also less than eight kilometers away, making Sky Loft a convenient choice for business trips, wedding guests, and easy weekend escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy absolute luxury in total privacy at Villa Tiga Puluh. This gorgeous contemporary retreat in Seminyak is made up of several pavilions tucked into lush tropical gardens. Seven bedrooms can accommodate up to fourteen friends and family members, and an attentive staff ensures a pampering stay in Bali.

Your holiday begins with a transfer from the airport to this serene oasis, and includes daily breakfast, housekeeping and more. The villa manager can help arrange additional services such as a private chef, in-villa massages and car rentals. With the details taken care of, spend your stay simply enjoying the tropical sunshine from the lounge area on the terrace or the pool, or relaxing in the shade of the gladak, a poolside pavilion with a daybed. In the evenings, try local seafood from the barbecue, serve refreshments at the indoor bar or unwind in the air-conditioned media room.

The welcoming interiors of this vacation rental pair traditional architecture with contemporary touches in a style that’s become known as Balinese neo-classical. A soaring vaulted alang-alang ceiling stretches over the open-concept living and dining areas, where natural-fiber rugs, woven furniture and wooden tables create an organic feel that’s balanced by industrial-chic dining chairs. The main pavilion also has a fully equipped kitchen.

The seven bedrooms at Villa Tiga Puluh are arranged in seven bungalows surrounding the pool and courtyard; all have en-suite bathrooms. There are six with king beds, including a spacious, honeymoon-worthy master suite and several with partially al-fresco showers, and one bedroom with two twin beds.

If you wish to explore Bali during your stay, there are several beaches just a short drive away, shopping and dining at Seminyak Square, and even a golf course. Try surfing in Kuta, play at the Finns Recreation Club sports complex or thrill to the waterslides at Waterbom Bali.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite luxury villa on the Indonesian island of Bali combines enchanting, traditional style with outstanding contemporary amenities. Situated within walking distance of Petitenget Beach and Double Six Beach, the villa enjoys one of the finest locations in the area of Seminyak, while exquisite living and dining spaces provide a private setting of consummate Balinese elegance. The four superb bedrooms all feature ensuite bathrooms, while top-shelf services such as a butler, villa supervisor, and 24-hour security ensure total comfort and peace of mind during your stay.

Surrounded by a beautiful stone wall, and shaded by lush gardens and lithe trees, the 600-square-meter-estate possesses the dreamy serenity of a tropical grove. Enjoy delicious days in the South Pacific sun, floating in the 11-by-4-meter swimming pool and sipping cool drinks on the sofa or loungers. At lunchtime, cook a delicious meal on the barbeque grill and relish it alfresco.

The villa's interior pavilion enjoys a wonderful plein-air feel, with an entire wall open to the pool terrace, and soaring, vaulted ceilings that allow the room to breathe the island air. The extraordinary décor, including original artwork and exquisite furnishings, evokes a profound and ancient serenity. In the evening, sip cocktails in the sumptuous lounge, prepare a delectable dinner in the fully equipped kitchen, and gather at the gorgeous dining table for an unforgettable feast.

The villa includes three suites with king beds and one with a queen, accommodating eight guests. All of the bedrooms feature deluxe ensuite bathrooms, stand-alone rain showers, air conditioning, and doors to the terrace and gardens. Wonderfully elegant and comfortable, the bedrooms are perfect private settings for downtown and rest.

Villa Alabali enjoys one of the finest possible locations in Seminyak for exploring the beaches and town. You’re just minutes on foot from Petitenget Beach and Double Six Beach, nine minutes on foot from Seminyake Beach, and a ten-minute walk from Seminyak Square. Batubelig Beach is less than five kilometers away. You’re also a short drive to Finns Recreation Club, Kuta, and Waterbonr Bali, while Nirwana Bali Golf Club is within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Anam is a spectacular luxury estate in southern Bali, just a kilometer-and-a-half from Seminyak and its world-famous beach. Consisting of two separate villas—Villa Anam-Bo and Villa Anam-Ba—the estate features an extraordinary central alfresco garden terrace with swimming pools, well-appointed interior living areas in both villas, and ten superb bedroom suites (five in each villa). The stunning design combines exquisite traditional Indonesian elements with high-end contemporary comforts and amenities. With accommodations for twenty, Villa Anam is an outstanding vacation rental for family reunions, retreats, or destination wedding guests.

The terrace invites you to enchanting days in the South Pacific sun, with two ample swimming pools forming a cross-shape in its center. Elegant loungers, a sumptuous canopied bed, and an ample lounge area surround them. A high-end outdoor kitchen is perfect for cooking delicious barbeque meals. The white archway over the pools, adorned with tropical flowers, along with the lush gardens surrounding the estate, creates the dreamy ambiance of a secret sanctuary.

Each of the villas faces this central terrace, with wide open walls inviting delicious breezes indoors and creating an expansive space for dining and relaxation. Both villas feature great rooms with high ceilings, superbly appointed with a lounge, bar, fully equipped kitchen, and dining table for twelve. Villa Anam-Bo additionally features an air-conditioned exercise room and an outstanding home theather.

There are five bedroom suites in each villa—four with sumptuous queen beds, and one with two twins. All ten suites have ensuite bathrooms as well as excellent AV equipment, air conditioning, and ceiling fans. The master suite in both villas features a queen bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub.

Beyond your private paradise at Villa Anam, you're within minutes of some of the finest destinations and activities in Bali. The town and beach of Seminyak are a few minutes from your door, and the famous Double Six Beach, Petingenet Beach, and Batubelig Beach are also minutes away. Golfers are an easy drive to Nirwana Bali Golf Club, while the outstanding sports and leisure complex Finns Recreation Club is within six kilometers.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The line between indoors and out gets a bit blurry at Balimu Villa. Tucked into a lush private garden near Seminyak, this Bali vacation rental invites you to savor the warm breezes from living spaces that flow into each other. Its three bedrooms are just the right size for a tropical getaway with family, a couples’ retreat with a few friends or an indulgent honeymoon close to the beach.

Your holiday at Balimu begins with an airport transfer and includes daily continental or Asian breakfast, plus butler and housekeeping service. You’ll have to decide for yourself whether the best place to relax in the garden is on the daybed, on a lounger or in the pool. There’s also a barbecue, as well as high-tech features such as a smart TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Fold-away glass walls are all that separates the villa’s terrace from an open-concept living area with a pair of sofas and a dining table for six. Dark wood echoes the texture of the garden outside, while gold accents throughout the space add a touch of glam. And don’t forget that you can call your butler for anything from a cocktail to a meal.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Two of the bedrooms open to their own balconies, and the third bedroom opens to an outdoor sitting area that’s next to a section of the pool.

From its location on the exclusive Laksmana estate, Balimu Villa is just a short walk from plenty of things to see and do. Head to the golden sands of Petitenget Beach for an afternoon in the sun or a look at the temple. In the evenings, you can also find a range of restaurants within walking distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Shanti Residence is a private vacation home that acts more like a luxurious boutique hotel. With seven well-appointed bedroom suites, two swimming pools, and plenty of indoor/outdoor space, Shanti is perfect for a large-scale event like a family reunion, corporate retreat, or a sun-kissed destination wedding. Located just outside Bali, minutes away from two beautiful beaches, this hilltop vacation rental has the privacy you need, while remaining close enough to many of Indonesia's most prized tourist attractions.

Wide-openings to the terrace, rich wood textures, high vaulted ceilings, and designer furniture set an elegant, yet breezy, tone throughout Shanti's spacious interior. The common areas have an open-concept layout, perfect for hosting, while spaces like the home theatre, spa room, exercise room, and recreation room are great when you're looking for something more intimate.

The staff at The Shanti Residence will do everything they can to make sure your Bali vacation is as unforgettable as it is relaxing. With daily breakfast and afternoon tea, chef services, a sommelier, housekeeping, and a twenty-four-hour butler, you can focus on your rest and rejuvenation. At dinner, there's formal dining space for ten, and a wine cellar to find the perfect pairing for your meal. After, let the party continue in the living room, where the musician in your group can serenade their audience on the baby grand piano.

Bali's National Golf Club is a must-play for any golf aficionados in your group. With scenic holes that take you through creeks, canyons, and islands, you're sure to enjoy their one-of-a-kind environment. You may even have spectators, as colorful tropical birds are often seen from the club's fairways. After a morning on the golf course, spend your afternoon relaxing at, nearby, Geger beach. Likely the most secluded beach in the area, Geger is home to golden sands and calm waters, great for swimming and snorkeling.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
_ Please note that this home is subject to fluctuating rates. For an accurate quote, please contact a Villa Specialist. _

 Step into your own private island paradise at Andaz - Three Bedroom Villa. Set in the Andaz Maui at Wailea Resort, the villa pairs the seclusion of a private home with the amenities of a resort, all in a spectacular beachfront setting. Custom mod-inspired furnishings ensure that no matter where you look, inside or out, you’ll have a gorgeous view.

Your stay at Andaz begins with a round-trip airport transfer and welcome beverage, and continues with complimentary snacks. The villa has its own gas barbecue, outdoor shower and spacious lanai with lounging and dining areas, but you can also explore the pool, beach bar, restaurants and lounges at the resort. In the evenings mix cocktails at the mini-bar and share snaps from the day via Wi-Fi.

Luxurious finishes, sleek lines and neutral tones make the villa’s interiors just as appealing as its palm tree-studded surroundings. Polished walnut and teak furniture, like a slatted sofa in the great room, feels inviting and mod, marble tile floors are coolly elegant and a custom wool rug adds warmth and texture to the sitting area. There’s room for everyone at the dining area’s long wooden table, and trying out local specialties is a pleasure on the high-end appliances in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the three bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed, walk-in closet and lanai access, a second bedroom has a king bed and the third bedroom has two double beds and a walk-in closet. The bedrooms have the same enticing mix of wood furniture and neutral fabrics, and in the bathrooms, lava-stone floors are a nod to the island setting.

The villa has direct access to Mokapu Beach and is a 5-minute walk from Wailea Beach. If you’d like to explore Maui’s other beaches, head to Keawakapu Beach, about 1 mile away, Polo Beach, about 1.5 miles away, Po’olenalena Beach, about 2 miles away, White Rock Beach, about 2.5 miles away, or Makena State Park, just under 5 miles away. Book a tee time at Wailea Golf Course, about 2.5 miles away. Plan your airport transfer from Kahului Airport, about 16 miles from Andaz, or Kapalua Airport, about 33.5 miles away.

NOTE: Andaz Resort Amenities along with villa inclusions are subject to review and change without notice.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on 5,250 sqm of beachfront landscape, Soori Estate is unparalleled. Ten bedrooms, all with uninterrupted views of the island’s southwest coast, enjoy an elevated position: two master bedrooms and adjoining suites on the upper level, six bedrooms on the ground level. Relax in a multitude of spaces, from the landscaped gardens inside, to the private pools and outdoor pavilions. Enjoy the royal treatment with oversized bathtubs, grand shower rooms, and top-notch furniture throughout by Poliform, Flexform and B&B Italia and the resort’s own bespoke design, the Soori Collection.

For those in search of spacious and private family residences in Bali, this luxury villa is the resort’s most lavish venue for opulent celebrations, family holidays and group retreats.

listing.listing_description:
A contemporary masterpiece mixed with elements drawn from traditional Balinese architecture, Villa Nora represents the idyllic Indonesian escape. Bali-bound travelers will fall in love with this spot, which provides panoramic views of the seemingly infinite Indian Ocean from atop a dramatic cliff side. With a luxurious and spacious interior and five guest suites that can host ten visitors at a time, it’s large enough to host social events to a capacity of two hundred, though remaining intimate enough for friends, families and lovers to enjoy unabated.

Guests staying at Villa Nora have full access to The Ungasan Estate’s luxurious amenities which include tennis courts, kayaking equipment and a putting green. On the villa grounds, guests have their own swimming pool found next to a spacious deck, perfect for yoga classes or morning calisthenics. For those who are so inclined, a private full service bar awaits and is run by the villa’s staff, which includes a butler, chef, security and chauffeur.

The villa features many sliding doors and vaulted ceilings which add to the ambience of already spacious living areas. Sparsely decorated, though amply furnished with a refined style, guests will love the simple yet elegant dining area with plenty of room for everyone at dinner time. The kitchen here has it all covered, with every appliance and a functional layout that makes cooking a breeze.

The guest suites have been designed to provide a sanctuary for the soul. Each room boasts a full en-suite bathroom, as well as a private, furnished deck. The master suite even has its own plunge pool and amazing ocean views. Each room has king size canopy beds with billowing white sheets that add flair to the rooms, as well as air conditioning, ceiling fans, televisions, music players and a mini bar, which just make the whole room über-posh.

Uluwatu is a beautiful region of Bali and has plenty to do for first-time or repeat visitors. Start off with the nearby Uluwatu Temple, one of Bali’s nine ‘directional’ temples built in the 11th century. Nearby, Garuda Wisnu Kencana is an immense cultural park where guests can bask in Balinese theater, art, dance and music – renowned for their melodic intricacy and unique tones. Uluwatu also offers a gorgeous coast and is a favorite among the international surfing community for its excellent waves.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: The Ungasan Clifftop Resort is located approximately 15 km south of Ngurah Rai International Airport in an area commonly referred to as ‘The Bukit’. The resort is located on the southernmost tip of the island of Bali, perched high above the Indian ocean on the white limestone cliffs of Uluwatu.

Selatan Restaurant - Perched cliff edge, Selatan Restaurant offers a sophisticated setting in which to enjoy exquisitely prepared dishes complimented by an extensive wine list that will satisfy the most discerning palates.

Sundays Beach Club - Peak over the Uluwatu Cliff Edge and stare in amazement at your first glimpse of the beautiful turquoise Indian Ocean below which makes the stunning landscape for Sundays Beach Club. The 180 meters white sandy beach is accessed by an inclinator that will carry you down the sheer drop of the cliff face providing the perfect backdrop for spectacular photo opportunities.

Laze away the day in the sun enjoying the cool tunes of our resident DJ and the service from our fun & friendly Balinese staff. For the more active take a kayak or stand up paddle board out for a ride. When the tide pulls low the rock pools and crystal clear lagoon are perfect for swimming and snorkeling.
Once you have worked up an appetite in the water, step into the open air bamboo pavilion where a casual yet classy setting awaits you.

Sundays’ beach restaurant menu boasts a well-balanced mix of local, international and fusion cuisine. The Sundays Beach Club mantra is ''Simple Food”, done exceptionally well'' and we do that by starting with only the freshest and best quality ingredients.
Sundays Beach Club provides an experience like no other in Bali. All who visit this piece of paradise are in awe of its beauty, they leave relaxed, sun kissed and dreaming of when they will return.

Weddings, Celebrations & Events - The Ungasan Clifftop Resort has nine superb Venues for a romantic wedding on the white sandy beach or a private ceremony in your own villa with uninterrupted views of the ocean. It is also the ultimate corporate event venue and is ideal for smaller groups and even for exclusive use. Whether you fancy a fabulous soiree on the cliff edge or something more intimate in the private villas, the staff can help create your perfect celebration in style.

listing.listing_description:
A cliff-edge estate with an unmistakable mystical ambience, Villa Chintamani can offer groups of up to ten at a time the opportunity to experience Indonesia’s famed island of Bali in a setting akin to a mini-resort. A part of the prestigious The Ungasan Clifftop Resort, near Uluwatu Temple, Villa Chintamani offers five plush sleeping quarters, gorgeous environs, first-class amenities and is within walking distance from an exclusive resort frequented by many A-listers. Come to Villa Chintamani and see the island that was once famously described as ‘The Morning of the World.’

Aside from convenient beach access, Villa Chintamani has a large, private swimming pool to meet any immediate aquatic urges. Inside the home, guests will find a dazzling full service bar attended to by one of the villa’s professional staff. Additionally, the home is replete with total home theater systems, satellite television, Wi-Fi and many more creature comforts.

The villa and its furnishings are both stylish and contemporary, leaving guests with a satisfied modern atmosphere, never wanting for anything more. A few interesting knickknacks and Indonesian objects d’art adorn the rooms, though ever so subtly. The kitchen provides a beautiful and inviting layout, but also possesses many appealing features and appliances, among them a very handy table-top grill.

The en-suite bedrooms have a charming and simple decor that are conducive towards a harmonious night of sleep. All the rooms have king size beds as well as satellite televisions, music players, security safes and mini bars. The rooms even boast private plunge pools with spacious decks and breathtaking views.

Guests staying at Villa Chintamani will relish the fact that their accommodations are so centrally located to so many fascinating sites and points of interest. Try the nearby Selatan Restaurant which boasts not only delicious meals, but also a wine list so long it will impress even the most seasoned oenophile. Sundays Beach Club is also cliff side, where guests can enjoy music, the company of other adventure-seeking travelers and plenty of thrilling aquatic sports including kayaking and surfing. Golf enthusiasts will be glad to know that New Kuta Golf Course is only a short fifteen-minute drive and has been recognized as Indonesia’s leading course. Go ahead, take a swing!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking the unending Indian Ocean and with the eternal Mount Batukaru in the backdrop, Soori - Six Bedroom Residence is a dream vacation villa in Bali. Much like the legendary Indonesian island itself, Soori Residence is highly artful both in its sleek architecture and stylish decor that effortlessly melds with the tropical gardens of the estate. The villa’s five lavish suites accommodate groups up to ten, each of whom will be captivated by the estate’s private and privileged beachfront.

Soori - Six Bedroom Residence has countless amenities, everything a traveling guest would want to have while on their tropical dream vacation. The zero-edge swimming pool produces a great optical effect of seemingly merging with the ocean and is conveniently located next to the inviting alfresco dining area, grill and wet bar which are all just screaming for a party. Indoors, guests are encouraged to take full advantage of the cutting-edge Apple TV and Bose sound system. An appointed butler, housekeeper and 24-hour room service will keep guests happy as proverbial clams.

The villa’s open air pavilions and decor not only compliment each other, but also the lush tropical gardens. The rooms feature designer light fixtures and a largely black-and-white color scheme with splashes of eye-grabbing ochre and chestnut brown. The interior dining space features a long and elegant rustic table, next to the gourmet kitchen.

Three of home’s five en-suite bedrooms have been equipped with plush king size beds, while the remaining two rooms have two comfortable twin size beds. Each room also has a sound system hooked up to iPod docks and balconies with dazzling ocean views. Additionally, the master suite boasts an alluring terrazzo bath tub and a large walk-in closet.

Soori - Six Bedroom Residence is only a five minute drive from Pan Pacific Resort, offering excellent tennis and golf facilities. Other encouraged activities include a climb up Mount Batukaru, which should be reserved for experienced hikers, through the island’s largest wetland rainforest. Sangeh Monkey Forest should also be on everyone’s list, not just for a chance to see the monkeys, but also to see the 17th century Bukit Sari Temple. Experience peace of mind and tropical bliss like never before with Luxury Retreats in Bali!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge yourself with a tranquil setting close to the beach, sophisticated style and warm Balinese hospitality at Villa Samuan. Beautifully appointed and fully staffed, this luxury vacation rental is close to the amenities of Seminyak, but set in a quiet residential neighborhood. It can be booked with two bedrooms, three bedrooms or the full five bedrooms, depending on the size of your group of friends or family.

Nestled amid more than 17,000 square feet of lush tropical gardens, Villa Samuan feels like your own private oasis. It opens to a lovely courtyard with a pool, an array of loungers and sunbeds, a barbecue and an outdoor dining area. The property also features a spa room, cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. Your holiday includes airport transfers and daily breakfast, as well as the services of a cook, butler, villa manager and housekeeper.

Villa Samuan is divided into the three-bedroom Villa Siki and the two-bedroom Villa Kalih. Each villa has incredible living spaces decorated in a unique East-meets-West style, with objets and artwork from around the globe displayed against wood-paneled walls. The high ceilings characteristic of Balinese architecture lend a breezy feel to the living and dining rooms, as do louvered doors opening to the terrace. Though your stay does include cook service, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

Villa Siki is an ideal home away from home for a small family, while Villa Kalih is perfect for a couples’ getaway or even a honeymoon. Together, the two villas can welcome up to ten guests. Villa Siki has a master bedroom with a king bed and two bedrooms with queen beds, and Villa Kalih has one king bedroom and one queen bedroom. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Villa Samuan is a 9-minute walk from Seminyak Beach, a long stretch of white sand that’s home to several oceanfront restaurants, shops and galleries, and a 10-minute walk from the Seminyak Square shopping complex. The villa is only a short drive from many of the area’s other attractions, from other beaches to the Tanah Lot Sea Temple and Nirwana Bali Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find lovely surroundings and a quiet atmosphere in the midst of Sydney at Villa Queen. Though it’s set in the Woollahra area, just minutes from beaches, shopping, dining and more, this sophisticated vacation rental feels like a secluded private retreat thanks to expansive outdoor areas and refined interiors. Use its five bedrooms as the backdrop for a family reunion or intimate destination wedding, or as a base for exploring the city with friends.

Enjoy sunny days on a broad terrace with a pool and al-fresco dining area. If you’ve been out sightseeing, stretch out in the home gym, then pour a glass from the wine fridge and unwind in front of the Apple TV, sound system and Wi-Fi or pick out a tune on the grand piano.

Bright and elegant, the interiors of Villa Queen are a study in comfortable modern style. Tones of cream and blue echo the colors of the nearby beaches, and a free-flowing layout gives you the luxury of starting with cocktails in the living room and then moving to the dining room to eat. A separate great room has a second sitting area, breakfast nook and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

The villa has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a double bed and en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a double bed and twin bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. All five bedrooms have ceiling fans and luxe little touches such as heated bathroom floors.

A holiday at Villa Queen puts you just an 8-minute walk from the leafy paths of Cooper Park, and an 8-minute drive from from Woollahra Golf Club and Lady Martin’s Beach. It’s well worth the drive to nearby Bondi Beach, where you can embark on a honeymoon-worthy stroll down to Coogee Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Breathtaking ocean views await at villa Sea Breeze. Located twenty minutes outside the hustle and bustle of downtown Sydney, the exclusive neighborhood of Vaucluse is home to some of the city’s hidden gems, including historical sites, boutique shops, and fine dining establishments. Villa Sea Breeze is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or honeymoon. 

Hardwood floors, pure-white walls, and touches of nautical inspiration give Sea Breeze a stately charm that is sure to impress. With an open concept main floor that links outdoor areas along the front, side, and back of the house, it’s easy to feel how Sea Breeze got its name. You’ll love the scenery from the front balcony, with a view that captures the city’s buildings and houses as they narrowly avoid slipping off the cliff’s edge, and into the ocean below. If there’s a film buff in your party, the media lounge and bar introduces a new side of Sea Breeze, with plush leather seating, exposed brick walls, and an exclusive ambiance. In the kitchen, you’ll appreciate high-end appliances and a breakfast bar that doubles as a serving window to the alfresco dining area on the terrace.

This vacation rental features a four-car garage, formal and alfresco dining for eight, and a spacious atmosphere for hosting. The back terrace has a refreshing swimming pool. Inside you’ll appreciate a gas fireplace, sound system, Apple TV, air conditioning, and more.

Just five kilometers from your quiet neighborhood, you’ll find one of the most exciting stretches of sand on the planet, Bondi Beach. Whether you’re looking to surf, swim, or work on your tan, Bondi’s lengthy shoreline has the spot for you. And, on the inland side of the sand, you’ll find quaint cafes and dining on Hall Street, and plenty of casual pubs and nightlife establishments as well. For even more vibrant city life, visit The Rocks, a trendy neighborhood packed with bars, many of which are known for their views of the Sydney Opera House.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designed by the prestigious Singaporean architect Chan Soo Khian, Soori - Three Bedroom Residence is an elite beach house located on the black sands of Bali’s beautiful Tabanan shore. This villa boasts three plush guest suites with space for six visitors and is awash in luxury amenities for them to enjoy. Experience Bali, Indonesia’s greatest bastion of culture and art while staying in the unparalleled Soori - Three Bedroom Residence!

Jump into the villa’s chic infinity swimming pool, or lounge around on the furnished cozy terrace next to the alfresco dining area and grill. Guests are also offered the chance to use a sleek new Apple TV, not to mention video games, a Bose sound system, as well as a spa and fitness facility. Both the villa and guests are looked after by a professional staff consisting of a butler, security guard and housekeeper.

The great room of Soori - Three Bedroom Residence is both generous in size and character, the result of a combination of a contemporary decor scheme juxtaposed with intricate though understated Indonesian objets d’art. Sliding glass walls allow for the splendor of the outdoors to be seen inside, as well as facilitating an ease of access to the gardens, pool and terrace areas. The dining area has a long and elegant rustic wooden table with room for fourteen creating an undeniably sophisticated atmosphere.

Soori - Three Bedroom Residence's three en-suite bedrooms have been adorned with the bold color scheme found in the rest of the home, but with additional small accents of color that produce an especially dramatic effect. Two rooms boast plush king size beds while the third room has been equipped with two twin beds. Additionally, each room has a balcony with ocean views and the bathrooms have been stocked with Spa Alila natural toiletries.

Bali has been described by many as an island intoxicated with the arts, and this statement can be easily proven in any one of its many art galleries, such as nearby Subak Museum. Kelating Pan Pacific Resort is an elite resort providing the opportunity for a relaxing eighteen holes or a rousing game of tennis. For those who crave the hustle and bustle of lively streets, excellent dining and ample shopping, cosmopolitan Seminyak is the place to go!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Ambar can be found at a dramatic cliff side in southern Bali’s posh Uluwatu region, enticing adventure-seeking epicureans to experience Indonesia’s celebrated ‘Island of Peace.’ This gated luxury property offers a chance at the Balinese dream vacation of a lifetime, with open air pavilions and five lavish guest suites providing breathtaking views of the ocean. More than capable of hosting groups of up to ten, this Ungasan Clifftop Resort property is also a top choice for special events including weddings, anniversaries and birthdays.

Perfect for families, diverse groups and corporate retreats, this villa features a large media room with a long desk and generous seating making a great indoor play area. The waters of the protracted zero-edge swimming pool, with safety fence, seem to merge with the boundless Indian Ocean. Your reservation includes a full staff with daily housekeeping, private chef, butler, manager, security and chauffer. Surrender to infinite relaxation as Ungasan's signature service welcomes you with the warm embrace of the loving service Bali has become famous for worldwide.

Whether it’s tantalizing your taste buds, enjoying a playful day of watersports on the white sands of Sundays Beach Club or playing some tennis or volleyball, the resort includes more amenities than you will likely have time to use. Or you can always just relax in the comfort of this white and bright villa with a home theater, a private full-service bar, satellite television and Wi-Fi. The interiors of Villa Ambar are sensuous and embellished with rich wooden accents.

The interconnecting bedrooms at Villa Ambar make it easy for families with children. The master bedroom is cleverly cut into the cliff and, as a consequence, is discreetly located downstairs to provide utmost privacy. Hand carved timber pieces create a romantic ambience within these minimalist, yet plush sleeping quarters.

The limestone cliffs of Uluwatu provide not only a promontory position from which to take in Bali’s dazzling landscape and the sea, but it is also a secluded venue for elite resorts and villas. The Ungasan Clifftop Resort of which Villa Ambar is a part, boasts hard court tennis, a putting green, a fully equipped gym and the Vela Spa. The Selatan Restaurant is the resort’s cliff side luxury eatery and provides delectable dishes and an impressive wine list. Come unwind in lovely Bali!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Tamarama is a palatial villa located in Uluwatu near the southern coast of Bali. Providing a colonial-style architectural typically found in the Caribbean or the Hamptons, it boasts five stately guests quarters that can accommodate up to ten. Awash in luxury features both inside and outside the home, it also has room to host large social events. Part of the exclusive Ungasan Clifftop Resort, get ready for the tropical holiday of a lifetime!

This cliff edge property offers direct access to the beach. Featuring two swimming pools with an oversized bar and enclosed entertainment area poolside, this villa is perfect for those special celebrations with family and friends. Little can compare to the delight of jumping into the immaculate swimming pool and then rinsing off in the alfresco shower. The grounds even feature an open air pavilion reminiscent of a romantic wedding chapel allowing you to celebrate your nuptials while overlooking the Indian Ocean or just enjoying a cocktail at sunset.

Surrender to infinite relaxation as The Ungasan’s signature service welcomes you with the warm embrace of the loving service Bali has become famous for worldwide. Whether it’s tantalizing your taste buds at Selatan restaurant, enjoying a playful day of watersports on the white sands of Sundays Beach Club or playing some tennis or volleyball, the resort includes more amenities than you will likely have time to use. Or you can always just relax in the comfort of this white and bright villa with a home theater, a private full-service bar and Wi-Fi.

The five exquisite bedrooms at Villa Tamarama all feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, king beds, satellite television and mini bars. Fine linens and accoutrements provide excellent nights of rest. Just a few paces from your four-poster bed, you will find direct access to the wonderful climate outside.

The Uluwatu region of Indonesia exudes a serene ambience where locals and travelers alike savor the bucolic splendor of a land still largely unspoiled. The Indian Ocean provides Bali’s beaches with ocean waves that draw surfers from around the world. Indeed, the many activities best suited to this part of Bali are those that harness the island’s natural beauty and include kayaking, scuba diving and scenic hikes up limestone cliffs that reveal breathtaking views. Do it right in Bali with Luxury Retreats!

listing.listing_description:
Located in an unspoiled and magical part of the world, Villa Pawana is located within the exclusive The Ungasan Clifftop Resort in lovely Bali. Take in the beauty of the Indian Ocean and the lush well-manicured gardens around as you experience the ultimate tropical vacation in Indonesia. Just minutes from the beach, tennis and the New Kuta Golf Course, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate vacation in the soothing Balinese sun!

Between the villa itself and complimentary use of the resort’s spectacular facilities, the only problem you might have during your vacation at Villa Pawana is figuring out what to do first! At the resort, you will find a variety options for your vacation including the top choice Selatan Restaurant, The Vela Spa to take your cares away, watersports such as snorkeling and kayaking as well as tennis and beach volleyball. Back at your villa, the sparkling waters of the spectacular infinity edge swimming pool seem to merge with those of the Indian Ocean just at your doorstep. Alfresco dining is such a delight, especially with freshly grilled cuts off the grill.

With separate media room, lounge and dining areas that can be fully opened or closed off with air conditioning, the villa allows the entire family or entourage to stay close while ensuring privacy with individually housed accommodation. Relax in the comfort of this white and bright villa with a home theater, a private full-service bar and Wi-Fi. The open air concept keeps things airy and breezy.

Both secluded and luxurious, Villa Pawana is perfect for corporate guests and those requiring discreet quarters. The master bedroom is large with sweeping views and a private plunge pool. All five bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, satellite television and mini bars. Unwind in style!

Guests of Villa Pawana will enjoy the fact that Uluwatu is one of the least touristy places on the whole island and has long been a closely guarded secret from the outside world. The local culture thrives in preserving its ancient heritage surrounded by a breathtaking natural environment. The sacred cliff side Uluwatu Temple offers a special insight into Balinese religion, while the Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park hosts a wealth of Bali’s artistic traditions, exhibiting traditional theater, music and dance. There is something for everyone in Uluwatu!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This outstanding villa is situated within walking distance of Whale Beach along the Pacific coast north of Sydney. Built in the 1930s and enhanced with state-of-the-art amenities, the light-filled home is perched on a hillside with views of Pittwater and features expansive outdoor living areas. The four-story sandstone house includes four bedrooms accommodating eight, and is just minutes from some of the finest beaches, golf, and dining on this exquisite shore of New South Whales.

Nestled amid lush woods, the villa's swimming pool and inset spa invite you to soothing soaks under the sun or stars, while the poolside cabana with vaulted ceiling and exposed stone welcomes classic Australian barbeque meals. There is also an upper-level terrace with a second outdoor dining table and lofty views of the water.

Finely restored interiors blend antique elegance with fresh paint finishes, high-end appliances, and rustic accents in the furnishings and hardwood floors. Enjoy a fine Australian wine by the fire in the lounge, or watch a favorite movie in the media room with projector. Prepare delicious meals in the contemporary gourmet kitchen and relish them at the dining table. The pool room offers a private space with its own kitchenette, lounge, and dining area.

The villa's master suite features a king bed and walk-in closet, while its ensuite bathroom includes a stand-alone shower and a tub under a skylight window. The three guest bedrooms all have queen beds; one opens to the pool terrace, and one opens to a private patio with table.

The villa is an easy walk or brief drive to Whale Beach, and is just down the street from Jonah's Restaurant & Beach Hotel. Palm Beach and Avalon Beach are also nearby, and you're a few minutes from Palm Beach Golf Club, the Boathouse Palm Beach restaurant, and the famous Barrenjoey Lighthouse. Downtown Sydney is just over forty kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This gorgeous waterfront villa is situated in the prestigious Birchgrove neighborhood of Sydney, with expansive views of the Sydney Harbor. Just minutes from myriad attractions in downtown Sydney, the villa enjoys the harbor's largest private wharf (70 meters), spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, and outstanding amenities including a swimming pool. Three bedrooms accommodate six guests, providing an ideal venue for an Australian getaway with family or friends.

Perched above the wharf, the villa's outdoor entertaining deck accommodates fifty guests, ideal for cocktail and dinner parties after a day on the water. A swimming pool extends from the house, inviting you to refreshing plunges in the Pacific sun.

The villa's beautiful interiors include two main living areas. The primary kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serves a dining table for eight along with a sumptuous lounge with large TV. Downstairs, a service kitchen adjoins a secondary lounge and dining area. Luminous windows and glass doors throughout the home illuminate a palette of radiant white and soothing blues and grays, which harmonize with the expansive views of the bay. The villa also includes an office space for work or study.

All three bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys a walk-in closet, views of the bay, and a stand-alone tub in its bathroom, while the primary guest suite features a bay-view balcony.

Home to many celebrities, Birchgrove offers serenity and security within easy reach of Balmain, Darling Harbor, the Royal Botanic Gardens, and the famous Sydney Opera House. The beaches of Tamarama, Coogee, and Bondi are all a short drive away (between 13 and 15 kilometers). Proximity to Sydney Airport makes this villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend getaways.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Placed on the limestone Uluwatu cliffs of Bali, Villa Jamadara is part of an exclusive community known as The Ungasan Clifftop Resort. Named after one of nearby Thailand’s most famous romantic novels, Villa Jamadara has five charming en-suite bedrooms and room for ten guests, though it can generously host hundreds for large parties and functions. Truly, this luxury residence has it all with family-friendly features and a convenient position close to beaches, culture and entertainment unique to this enchanted area of the world.

This cliff-edge property features immaculate verdant gardens, replete with a multitude of alfresco features including amply furnished lounging and dining areas. The private pool is great for floating about, which is recommended before consuming a feast fresh off the sleek barbeque grill. The home offers plenty by way of idle pleasures including home theater systems, sound systems and Wi-Fi. Additionally, Villa Jamadara is run by a professionally trained staff, eager to ensure that guests have a carefree and exhilarating visit.

The main living pavilion contains the great room, as well as a smart library/office combination room as well as a media room. The lower level features precious architectural accomplishments and an elegant dining room with adjacent lounge area. Feel free to cook up a storm in the gourmet kitchen, as it is both well-equipped and stylishly inviting.

The omnipresent light-blue color of the Indian Ocean inspires the tonal scheme of the guest suites with subtle splashes that add vitality to an already sophisticated decor. Each room has been treated equally in terms of features, including plush king size beds dressed in stylish linens, air conditioning, entertainment tech and a mini bar. Bring the idea of seamless indoor/outdoor living to a crescendo at Villa Jamadara!

The German primitivist painter, Walter Spies was known to have described Bali as a place utterly intoxicated by the arts. Nearly a century later, this description remains apt and can be easily proven with a visit to the nearby Garuda Wisnu Kencana cultural park. This expansive space features public spaces, theaters and galleries all displaying Bali’s sophisticated cultural heritage. One sight in particular, the ‘Monkey Dance’ is performed here and is a real feast for the eyes as well as a small journey for the soul. Make this trip one for the books!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Immerse yourself in the incredible South Island scenery at The Lodge at the Hills. Nestled next to a golf course, this sleek vacation rental has panoramic views of the snow-capped peaks that have inspired countless filmmakers and artists—and remain a favorite with skiers. Make this gorgeous glacial valley the backdrop to a family reunion, a celebration of a milestone birthday or anniversary, or even a unique destination wedding that looks straight out of Middle Earth.

The lodge’s luxury amenities include a media room, bar, wine cellar and Wi-Fi; an art collection is also available. Revel in the views from outdoor living areas with a heated infinity pool, grass tennis court, sauna, barbecue, pizza oven, sitting and lounging areas, and al-fresco dining for twelve. Arrive in style on the helipad and, once there, take the golf cart around the idyllic setting.

The glass walls of this expansive contemporary estate reflect the scenery, while the metal roof echoes the colors of the mountains. Inside, open-concept layouts help showcase the views and encourage mingling, and unique architectural elements add visual interest. A sloped ceiling, for instance, connects the sitting area, breakfast table and fully equipped kitchen; a wave-like ceiling holds sculptural beauty in the formal dining room.

The six bedrooms at Lodge at the Hills can accommodate groups of twelve on holiday together. There are four bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas with fireplaces, including one room with its own kitchenette that could double as a honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and shared bath, and two twin beds and an en-suite, respectively.

In warmer weather, guests of the lodge enjoy private access to The Hills golf course, just next door; in cooler temperatures, you’ll find the ski areas at The Remarkables and Coronet Peak less than a 32 km drive away. Don’t miss a visit to central Queenstown, about 21 km away, which has boutiques and restaurants overlooking the waters of Lake Wakatipu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set amid the Northern Beaches of New South Wales, this beautiful villa is perched on a lofty slope with breathtaking, panoramic views of Palm Beach and the vast Pacific. The modern home features ample outdoor living and dining areas for savoring the ocean air, while its luminous interiors blend high-end comforts with mellow rustic accents and fine artwork. Four ample bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms—including a superb, top-floor master suite with sweeping ocean views—offer ideal accommodations for families and destination wedding guests.

Nestled amid lush greenery, the tiered estate features an infinity swimming pool on the lower level, a lush lawn, and a wrap-around patio that includes a spacious alfresco dining area. Revel in the Pacific sunlight on the wooden deck and plunge into the refreshing water. Kindle the barbeque in the afternoon as the kids play on the grass, and relish your meal in the dreamy breeze. Linger outdoors as the daylight softens, sipping Australian wine while the sunset transforms the sea and sky.

A broad wall opens from the veranda to the dining area, infusing the home with a delicious open-air ambiance. The wood dining table shares a space with the open kitchen, which is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and an island bar. The main living room features high ceilings with exposed wood beams. Original artwork graces the walls, reflecting both indigenous and modern traditions. Air conditioning, heating, and a lovely fireplace ensure cozy comfort in all seasons.

The master suite is on the top level of the house, boasting a walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom with shower and tub, and a private balcony overlooking the sublime panorama. There are two guestrooms with queen beds, and a kid-friendly room with three twin-size beds. Two of the guestrooms open to the lawn, and all enjoy ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Pacific Place is within a few minutes of Whale Beach and Palm Beach, while several other beaches are within four to twelve kilometers, including Avalon and Mona Vale. Palm Beach Golf Club and the iconic Barrenjoey Lighthouse are a short drive away. Outdoor sporting activities abound in the area, including hiking, biking, kayaking, and fishing. Sydney is a forty-kilometer drive to the south.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This oceanfront villa is situated in South Coogee, just outside downtown Sydney. Designed by the heralded contemporary architect Renato D'Ettorre, the modernist gem enjoys expansive views of the Pacific from its living areas, rooftop terrace, and all five bedrooms. An outstanding location places you within minutes of Coogee Beach and Wylie's Baths and just twelve kilometers from Sydney Opera House, while high-end amenities for cooking, entertainment, and wellness create a lovely home base for relaxing with loved-ones.

The villa's unique design blends a modernist aesthetic with exquisite accents of natural wood and earthy red brick. A luminous swimming pool invites you to a refreshing plunge under the sun or stars, while a dining table beckons you to barbeque meals in the gentle breeze. Indoors, the gourmet kitchen features Gaggenau/Miele appliances and a butler's pantry, and a central dining table for eight is joined by a cocktail lounge in the luminous bay. A larger lounge area is ideal for sipping Australian wine while gazing at the horizon. 

All five ocean-view bedrooms open to balconies, and four of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite and primary guest suite have king beds and private balconies, and the master bathroom includes a soaking tub. There are two guest rooms with double beds and a kid-friendly room with a twin bed.

The prime location of The Edge places you within minutes of Coogee Beach, Bondi Beach, and Tamarama Beach, as well as the famed tidal pools known as Wylie's Baths. Excellent opportunities for beachside dining, delicious coffee, and world-class surfing and snorkeling abound in this area, while the iconic attractions of downtown Sydney are in easy reach. With Sydney Airport about eight kilometers away, The Edge is a convenient choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes with family and friends.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
